step_feedback.feedback: Great job initiating the movement by squeezing your shoulder blades back and down. Keep focusing on a smooth, circular motion.
Excellent continuation of the circular motion. Try to maintain a consistent pace and ensure both shoulders move together.
You've completed the repetitions well! Remember to breathe deeply as you pull your shoulders back to maximize the benefits.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with your shoulder rolls! Keep up the smooth, circular movements, squeezing your shoulder blades back and down. Remember to breathe deeply with each roll to help your lymphatic system.
